content:
I find myself often searching for "that conversation between me and X". It might be nice to add a search term that's "topic or PM where X and Y participated".

May not be a thing that happens now -- not sure how technically hard it is, we'd have to think about the search UI, and the UI for displaying the results is probably gated on us having some kind of "display a list of topics" UI.
What would qualify as "a conversation b/w A and B"?

Topics both A & B participated in?

If it is this, then a "View common topics" option in this list could be a viable option.
Screenshot-from-2019-06-23-00-33-07.png

some kind of "display a list of topics" UI

Like showing topics without showing the messages in them?
Has there been any existing discussion along those lines?

What would qualify as "a conversation b/w A and B"?
Topics both A & B participated in?

yup!

If it is this, then a "View common topics" option in this list could be a viable option.

ah yeah, that's a great idea. "View all conversations with X"

Like showing topics without showing the messages in them?
Has there been any existing discussion along those lines?

well, I'm not sure exactly what it would be like. But one picture one could have in mind is how search works in gmail -- you see things grouped by "topic" rather than individual messages.

like pasted image
but without duplicates
maybe that, but each one with 2-3 lines of context? Like google search results?

maybe the context would just be the first few lines of the first message in the topic? Or the first few lines of the last message(s) in the topic?
(in the cases where there is no search word)
